title: Guide Voodoo Doll
summaries: The Guide Voodoo Doll is a boss-summoning item used to summon the Wall of Flesh. It is a guaranteed drop from Voodoo Demons, a fairly rare enemy in the Underworld.

When the item is equipped as an accessory, it becomes possible for the player and other <linked>NPCs</linked> to kill the <linked>Guide</linked> with direct attacks from <linked>weapons</linked> (which normally would not damage him). If the item is dropped and destroyed by <linked>lava</linked>, then the Guide will instantly die, if he exists in the world. If the item is destroyed by lava in the Underworld while the Guide exists, the Wall of Flesh will be summoned.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, if more than one Guide Voodoo Doll is in a stack upon being destroyed by lava, other NPCs will be killed alongside the Guide depending on the amount within the stack.
The Guide Voodoo Doll cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Sell: 2 SC
